short_summary: The Department of National Defence wants to procure some LED light fixtures. They have a maximum of six items being tendered, located in various provinces of Canada, having listed the desired quantities in each of the product categories.
description: The procurement is to address a requirement of LED flood light fixtures. Details of the 6 commodities are specified in a tender notice. They are among the mix of product descriptions such as GSIN, code NCAGE, quantity and UNCE structural Sales Listings ("client characteristics").",

full_summary:
# LED LIGHTS TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT

## Background Information

The Department of National Defence has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of LED lights, including various fixtures and components.

## Technical Specifications

The following items are included in the RFP:

* Item 1: 40 units of LED Flood Light Fixtures, 20-A0X5388, NSN: CAT-O-X488, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 2: 25 units of Equivalent LED Flood Light Fixtures to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* Item 3: 40 units of LED Red Flood Light Fixtures, 20-A0X7094, NSN: CAT-O-X488, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 4: 25 units of Equivalent LED Red Flood Light Fixtures to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* Item 5: 20 units of Explosion Proof Red LED Light Fixtures, TX60N00300, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 6: 12 units of Equivalent Explosion Proof Red LED Light Fixtures to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

## Requirements and Guidelines

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* Bidders proposing Equivalent or Substitute Products must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
* Tender documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contractor Information

The Department of National Defence is the contracting entity. The Contracting Officer's name and contact information are:

* Ashley Nadeau-Weeks
* contact: ASHLEY.NADEAU-WEEKS@forces.gc.ca
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

## Important Dates

* Notice of Proposed Procurement: 2022-12-07
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-05T14:00:00

Note: Additional information and tender documents can be found at the Canada Buys website.  [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/762fd246ca24968fa9345c5c6db588aa/w8482-230637_-_english_rfp_clauses.pdf](https://
